## Pull Request Checklist

Please ensure your pull request meets the following requirements:

### Code Quality
- [ ] The code follows the project's coding standards and style guide
- [ ] All new code is properly documented
- [ ] SwiftLint passes without warnings or errors
- [ ] The code builds successfully without warnings

### Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New functionality includes appropriate unit tests
- [ ] Test coverage is maintained or improved
- [ ] Manual testing has been performed on affected features

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md is updated if necessary
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md is updated with the changes
- [ ] Public APIs are properly documented
- [ ] Code comments are added where necessary

### Changes
- [ ] This PR addresses an open issue (link the issue: Closes #XXX)
- [ ] The changes are backwards compatible OR breaking changes are documented
- [ ] Version number is updated if this is a release

## Description

Please provide a brief description of the changes:
